name: FC2 Dark Style
description:
FC2 Dark Style
by Stylish v1.0
additional_info: FC2 (founded July 20, 1999) is a popular Japanese blogging host, the third most popular video hosting service in Japan (after YouTube and Niconico), and a web hosting company headquartered in Las Vegas, Nevada. It is the 11th most popular website in Japan overall (as of January 2018).
